definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The telephone operator who looks up telephong(telephone) numbers uses a computer.
sentences.chinese: 电话接线员使用电脑来查询电话号码。

sentences.english: The receptionist schedules all the doctor's appointments twenty minutes apart.
sentences.chinese: 接线员将医生所有的预约排程为间隔二十分钟。

sentences.english: Operator,I'd like to make a collet call,please.
sentences.chinese: 接线员，我要打对方付费的电话。

sentences.english: Does your area have training standards for 911 operators?
sentences.chinese: 你所在的区域有没有给911接线员设立培训标准呢？

sentences.english: Hello, operator. I'd like to make a person-to-person call to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 你好，接线员，我想往旧金山打个私人电话。

sentences.english: The operator told me Mr. Hinman was in charge.
sentences.chinese: 刚才接线员告诉我是亨曼先生负责此事。

sentences.english: The operator urged him to keep driving until he reached the light at Greenville Boulevard.
sentences.chinese: 接线员敦促他将车开到格林威尔大道。

sentences.english: Operator, how do I get information in Washington ?
sentences.chinese: 接线员，华盛顿查号台怎么打？

sentences.english: The operator will connect you with our sales department.
sentences.chinese: 接线员将把您的电话转接到销售部。

sentences.english: Whpertaining to the number I gaudio-videoe you, operator?
sentences.chinese: 接线员，我给你的号码是几多？

sentences.english: Hello, operator, I'd like to place a long distance call to Chicago, U. S. A.
sentences.chinese: 喂，接线员，我想打长途电话到美国芝加哥。

sentences.english: The telephone operator who looks up telephone(telephone) numbers uses a computer.
sentences.chinese: 电话接线员使用电脑来查询电话号码。

sentences.english: Hello, operator?Could you put me through the room 102?
sentences.chinese: 你好接线员，能帮我转接到102号房吗？

sentences.english: Operator, please get me Bank of China, Beijing branch.
sentences.chinese: 接线员，请给我接中国银行北京分行。

sentences.english: The operator couldn't get much out of him, except an address.
sentences.chinese: 接线员不能从他那边获得更多信息，除了一个地址。
